CGLS LAI.description: Generic HTTP-based MCP server for dataset family 'CGLS LAI'. Exposes tools to list and download known dataset URLs. Refine this config later with family-specific logic.

tools.name: list_known_urls
tools.description: Return the list of known dataset URLs for this family.

tools.name: download_url
tools.description: Download data from a given URL into local storage.

GFW_Forest_Carbon.description: MCP server for GFW Forest Carbon Gross Removals hosted on WRI CKAN. Exposes tools to inspect CKAN package metadata and download resources.

tools.name: get_package_metadata
tools.description: Return CKAN package_show metadata for the dataset.

tools.name: list_resources
tools.description: List resources (URLs, formats, size) from the CKAN package.

tools.name: download_resource
tools.description: Download a specific resource by resource_id.

tools.name: download_url
tools.description: Download data from a given URL into local storage.

Google_Solar.description: MCP server for Google Solar API. Provides solar potential data including rooftop analysis, solar panel configurations, and energy production estimates.

tools.name: get_building_insights
tools.description: Get solar potential information for a specific location.

tools.name: get_data_layers
tools.description: Get available solar data layers for a location.

tools.name: get_geotiff
tools.description: Download GeoTIFF data for solar analysis.

Hansen_GFC.description: MCP server for Hansen Global Forest Change (GFC) 2000–2024 v1.12. Exposes tools to list and download 10x10 degree GeoTIFF tiles for layers: treecover2000, loss, lossyear, gain, datamask.

tools.name: list_tiles
tools.description: List available tiles (by 10x10 degree indices) and their URLs.

tools.name: download_tile
tools.description: Download a single tile given its tile_id and layer.
